name: Center for Social Security Action & Research (CSSAR)
about: Center for Social Security Action & Research is a Delhi based NGO. They teach underprivileged children by conducting remedial classes

compensation.description: Teach Classes 1-10 Spoken English, life skills, music or dance.
Help CSSAR market and raise funds.
Document, Monitor and Evaluate Education Programs.

locations.street_address: 429, 3rd Floor, Rajendra Arihant Tower, B-1, Community Centre, Janakpuri
